title: LF ADC main
body:
Support main, usually roll;
Shen/Leona

But can play anyone (but Tahm, that dude I just cant work out for the life of me). 

Work best with Draven/Vayne/Jinx

Just add us in game and lets have a few games. 

S5 now (Int feeders causing demotions OP)

replies.body: Yo hit me up Draven/Vayne main here, I am bronze III but thats because I was braindead enough to do my placements at lvl 30. Maybe we can play a few normal games and see how we go?
If you look at my match history I've basically carried with Draven uh I'll be on in like 6 days due to school and work

Not gonna lie, thats impressive you can balance those two haha. 
added anyways
